'''Belegaer - Cercle d'etudes de Tolkien en Belgique'''<ref group=note>''[[Wiktionary:study circle|Study circle]] of Tolkien in Belgium</ref>  was the [[Tolkien Societies|Tolkien society]] of [[wikipedia:French Community of Belgium|French-speaking Community]] of [[Belgium]], which encompasses Brussels and Wallonia.

==History==
Belegaer was active in the 1980s and 1990s and published ''Cirth De Gandalf''. This society was likely dissolved after the death of its driving force, [[Nathalie Kotowski]], in 2001.<ref>{{Cite web|articleurl=https://www.jrrvf.com/fluxbb/viewtopic.php?id=4973|articlename=Décès de Nathalie Kotowski|author=Eruvike|dated=2001|accessed=25-05-2024|website=[https://www.jrrvf.com/fluxbb/index.php Tolkien en Version Française - Forum]}}</ref>
